questions.question: What is the difference between WordPress Posts and Pages?

answers.answer_a: There is no difference between Posts and Pages.

questions.question: What is the best way to change table prefix (wp_) before installation in WordPress?

answers.answer_b: Before Installation: Through this way, you have to go PHPMyAdmin -> Select your database -> Check all tables -> Add/Update table prefix.

questions.question: What are meta-tags?

answers.answer_a: Meta-tags are keywords and description used to display website or page information.
